document.webtitle: Wholesale Direct – Restaurant Supplies – coffee cups, napkins, thermal rolls, toilet paper, garbage bags
document.description: A cafe and restaurant supplier of a range of hospitality products including cutlery, plastic containers, napkins, coffee cups, toilet paper and garbage bags.

See our Privacy Policy for details Low Shipping Rates * available to capital city metro areas on the east coast,&major town centres. Click here for more details.
Wholesale Direct Restaurant Supplies
We supply a large range of food service, packaging&washroom products to restaurants, cafes, hotels, take away shops, fast food outlets, clubs&pubs. Our brands are well recognised in the industry,&include Solo cups, Merino napkins&much more.
Our success is based on a simple philosophy: providing wholesale prices direct to restaurants. This means that restaurants&cafes of all sizes have access to prices that were once only available to large restaurant chains&franchises.
As a result, restaurants can enjoy huge savings on all their disposable packaging products, including garbage bags, toilet rolls, plastic containers, plastic cutlery, straws, paper bags, napkins, paper tablecloths, restaurant docket books,&register rolls.
All of these items are available online,&can be purchased using our secure platform. We also offer a Fast Shop option - the industry leader in fast&convenient stock replenishment. It allows customers to view past orders online, update relevant details&checkout.
We hope you find our site easy to navigate, but if you get stuck, please don't hesitate to contact us on 1300 586 246.
1300 586 246
